name: Leonin
description: Leonin are proud, lion-like humanoids who live in prides and value strength and self-reliance.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Claws
traits.description: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Daunting Roar
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can let out a menacing roar. Creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you that can hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + Constitution modifier) or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Hunter's Instincts
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Athletics, Intimidation, Perception, or Survival.
